item.title: Samvat 2079: What Market Experts Make Of The Year Ahead
item.description: Samvat 2079: What Market Experts Make Of The Year Ahead While risks remain amid geopolitical strife and liquidity tightening, Indian markets are expected to fare well in Samvat 2079.

item.title: Top Stock Picks For Samvat 2079: Brokerages
item.description: Top Stock Picks For Samvat 2079: Brokerages Here’s a list of top Diwali stock picks by brokerages.

item.title: JPMorgan Chase President: Fed Isn’t Too Hawkish and Crypto Is ‘Kind of Irrelevant’
item.description: JPMorgan Chase President: Fed Isn’t Too Hawkish and Crypto Is ‘Kind of Irrelevant’ JPMorgan Chase’s president that crypto “is kind of irrelevant in the scheme of things.

item.title: Sensex makes biggest Muhurat gain in 14 years
item.description: Sensex makes biggest Muhurat gain in 14 years Boosted by strong buying in banking and financial stocks, the sensex gained 525 points, or nearly 1%, to end at 59,832 during Monday’s special hour-long Muhurat trading session on the BSE.

item.title: Russia Warns Europe: Natural Gas Price Cap Means Full Supply Cut-Off
item.description: Russia Warns Europe: Natural Gas Price Cap Means Full Supply Cut-Off As Europe heads into winter, the threat of sharply rising gas prices and sustained supply failures increases.

item.title: Hope floats for stalled India-UK trade deal
item.description: Hope floats for stalled India-UK trade deal Choosing Sunak as PM will give a much-needed boost to UK-India ties and might unblock the stalled bilateral trade deal which was meant to have been signed by Diwali.

item.title: IRS Updates Crypto-Related Instructions for 2022 Tax Filing
item.description: IRS Updates Crypto-Related Instructions for 2022 Tax Filing The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) has updated the crypto section in the 2022 draft instructions for tax form 1040.

item.title: Why Biden Wants To Release More Oil From The SPR
item.description: Why Biden Wants To Release More Oil From The SPR Last week, the White House caused a splash by announcing that President Biden was ready to release more crude from the strategic petroleum reserve.

item.title: UK bonds see record gain with Sunak as PM
item.description: UK bonds see record gain with Sunak as PM The pound rallied off session lows on Monday and gilts bounced, as former chancellor Rishi Sunak won the premiership race, giving investors a greater sense of confidence in the robustness of Britain's finances.

item.title: Americans See Another 10-Cent Drop In Gasoline Prices
item.description: Americans See Another 10-Cent Drop In Gasoline Prices Prices at the gas pump have declined 10 cents in a week, according to AAA, which says recession fears and further releases of America’s strategic petroleum reserve (SPR) have contributed to the further declines.

item.title: World’s Top Oilfield Service Provider Schlumberger Rebrands To SLB
item.description: World’s Top Oilfield Service Provider Schlumberger Rebrands To SLB Schlumberger (NYSE: SLB) is known as of Monday under its new name—SLB—to reflect its transformation from an oilfield services provider to a global technology company helping the energy transition, the world’s largest oilfield services provider said in a statement today.

item.title: Oil Tanker Market In Disarray As EU Ban On Russian Crude Nears
item.description: Oil Tanker Market In Disarray As EU Ban On Russian Crude Nears Six weeks before the EU embargo on Russian crude oil exports and the planned price cap on Russian oil enters into force, the global tanker and oil markets face increased uncertainty over who will ship Russia’s oil—and how—as of December 5.

item.title: Rishi Sunak Is A New And Old-Fashioned Tory
item.description: Rishi Sunak Is A New And Old-Fashioned Tory The next UK prime minister is a fascinating mix of the new and the old in the world of the ruling Conservative Party.

item.title: Muhurat trading: Samvat 2079 begins on an auspicious note
item.description: Muhurat trading: Samvat 2079 begins on an auspicious note Equity indices began Samvat 2079 on a positive note on Monday with both sensex and Nifty registering gains across all sectors.

item.title: Rishi Sunak Tells UK Tories To Unite As He Strives To Fix ‘Crisis’
item.description: Rishi Sunak Tells UK Tories To Unite As He Strives To Fix ‘Crisis’ Rishi Sunak called on his warring Conservative Party to unite as the UK’s incoming prime minister bids to fix the crisis facing the economy.

item.title: New Attacks On Energy Infrastructure Leave Millions Of Ukrainians Without Power
item.description: New Attacks On Energy Infrastructure Leave Millions Of Ukrainians Without Power Russia has launched new, “wide-scale” missile strikes on Ukraine’s civilian energy sites, causing power outages nationwide, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said in his regular video address late on October 22.

item.title: Gold Price on Diwali: Check 22-carat yellow metal rate before buying today
item.description: Gold Price on Diwali: Check 22-carat yellow metal rate before buying today Prices for 24-carat gold in the national capital Delhi increased to Rs 50,510 per 10 grams while 22-carat gold or ornamental gold was priced at Rs 48,100 per ten grams.

item.title: German Gas Giant Makes Headquarters Smaller And Colder To Save Energy
item.description: German Gas Giant Makes Headquarters Smaller And Colder To Save Energy Germany’s gas major Uniper will reduce the use of office space at its headquarters by half and maintain lower temperatures in the space remaining in use, German media reported, as quoted by Reuters.

item.title: Hong Kong Presents Digital Currency Prototype, Project Aurum
item.description: Hong Kong Presents Digital Currency Prototype, Project Aurum Financial authorities in Hong Kong have unveiled a prototype of the Chinese autonomous territory’s own central bank digital currency called Project Aurum.

item.title: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves
item.description: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves Boris Johnson pulled out of the race to lead the UK’s ruling Conservative Party and the nation, ending a bid to replace Liz Truss as prime minister.

item.title: Diwali 2022: MASSIVE crowd witnessed at Anand Vihar bus stand and metro stations due to festivities
item.description: Diwali 2022: MASSIVE crowd witnessed at Anand Vihar bus stand and metro stations due to festivities Diwali 2022: Heavy crowd gathered at Anand Vihar bus stand and metro station to travel home ahead of festivities, reports ANI.
